## List of related migrations

- [ ] Remove dependencies we don't directly need such as `ethereumjs` in favor of `ethers`'s alternatives

We're adding custom behaviors to support both Truffle and Ethers while we're migrating. A couple of those things to consider are when finishing the migration are:

- Remove all the `DEPRECATE` annotations for packages we still need
- Remove high-level snapshot introduced in #4652 in favor of `loadFixture` (if AccessManager doesn't consume the `block.timestamp` as we initially thought)
- We'll need to support both ethers's `signers` and Truffle `accounts` in [this line](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/f92dce51ed24a5b4e0009c1522ee12b30f3409ac/hardhat/env-contract.js#L22). We should remove `accounts` support eventually
- See if we can get https://github.com/NomicFoundation/hardhat/pull/4449 and migrate
- Reconsider where to put `testCommutative`
